name: The Weight of Grief
description:
This is The Weight of Grief. A 2 chapter gaming novel. Choose the right answears to forget the grief of your lost wife, remember moments and places you've been with her and meet old friends and locations trough this journey.

This jam version has only 2 levels, therefore, 2 chapters of the story. Our original script has about 5 chapters, but, obviously, with 5 people we wouldn't be able to make 5 levels with 5 different maps. So we made only the 2 first ones and will finish the others after the jam.

The jam theme was Wisdom and its "limitation" is: "Weight must be a mechanic".
Our interpretation of the theme, and how we used it, was in a psychological sense of weight. Losing the weight, or burden, that losing someone brings to your life and experiences.

The game is point and click. So just click around, find people and objects, experience the game and tell us what you've thought.
